nodes.title: Start
nodes.description: the starting node for all classes

nodes.title: Warrior
nodes.description: the starting node for the warrior class

nodes.title: Templar
nodes.description: the starting node for the templar class

nodes.title: Rogue
nodes.description: the starting node for the rogue class

nodes.title: Sorcerer
nodes.description: the starting node for the sorcerer class

nodes.title: Engineer
nodes.description: the starting node for the engineer class

nodes.title: Power Strike
nodes.description: empower your next attack to deal bonus damage equal to your strength modifier

nodes.title: Power Strike II
nodes.description: empower your next attack to deal bonus damage equal to your strength modifier + 1d6

nodes.title: Power Strike III
nodes.description: empower your next attack to deal bonus damage equal to your strength modifier + 2d6

nodes.title: Cleave
nodes.description: attack all enemies in a 3 meter wide square around you

nodes.title: Cleave II
nodes.description: attack all enemies in a 3 meter wide square around you, dealing bonus damage equal to your strength modifier

nodes.title: Cleave III
nodes.description: attack all enemies in a 3 meter wide square around you, dealing bonus damage equal to your strength modifier + 1d6

nodes.title: Faithful Aura
nodes.description: does something different based on your faith

nodes.title: Faithful Aura II
nodes.description: does something different based on your faith

nodes.title: Faithful Aura III
nodes.description: does something different based on your faith

nodes.title: Heal
nodes.description: heal a target for 1d6 + your faith modifier

nodes.title: Heal II
nodes.description: heal a target for 2d6 + your faith modifier

nodes.title: Heal III
nodes.description: heal a target for 3d6 + your faith modifier

nodes.title: Quick Strikes
nodes.description: attack twice in a row

nodes.title: Quick Strikes II
nodes.description: attack twice in a row, dealing bonus damage equal to your dexterity modifier

nodes.title: Quick Strikes III
nodes.description: attack twice in a row, dealing bonus damage equal to your dexterity modifier + 1d6

nodes.title: Sneak Attack
nodes.description: attack an enemy from behind, dealing bonus damage equal to your dexterity modifier

nodes.title: Sneak Attack II
nodes.description: attack an enemy from behind, dealing bonus damage equal to your dexterity modifier + 1d6

nodes.title: Sneak Attack III
nodes.description: attack an enemy from behind, dealing bonus damage equal to your dexterity modifier + 2d6

nodes.title: Magic Missile
nodes.description: shoot a magic missile at an enemy

nodes.title: Magic Missile II
nodes.description: shoot a magic missile at an enemy, dealing bonus damage equal to your intelligence modifier

nodes.title: Magic Missile III
nodes.description: shoot a magic missile at an enemy, dealing bonus damage equal to your intelligence modifier + 1d6

nodes.title: Shield
nodes.description: create a shield that absorbs damage equal to your intelligence modifier

nodes.title: Shield II
nodes.description: create a shield that absorbs damage equal to your intelligence modifier + 1d6

nodes.title: Shield III
nodes.description: create a shield that absorbs damage equal to your intelligence modifier + 2d6

nodes.title: Turret
nodes.description: summon a turret that attacks enemies

nodes.title: Turret II
nodes.description: summon a turret that attacks enemies, dealing bonus damage equal to your intelligence modifier

nodes.title: Turret III
nodes.description: summon a turret that attacks enemies, dealing bonus damage equal to your intelligence modifier + 1d6

nodes.title: Repair
nodes.description: repair a target for 1d6 + your intelligence modifier

nodes.title: Repair II
nodes.description: repair a target for 2d6 + your intelligence modifier

nodes.title: Repair III
nodes.description: repair a target for 3d6 + your intelligence modifier
